html:
{{letter_head}}

MOVEMENT ORDER

{{ doc.name }}

Date: {{ doc.posting_date }}   
  1. Ministry/Department Dzongkhag
    		2.  : State Mining Corporation Ltd
  2. Pool Vehicle No
    		3.  : {{doc.vehicle_number}}
  3. Name Of the Driver with Driving License No.
    		4.  : {{doc.driver_name}}
  4. Department & Officer on whose duty the vehicle has been detailed
    		5.  : {{doc.employee_name}}
  5. Purpose of Movement
    		6.  : {{doc.purpose}}
    To : {{doc.place}}
  6. Kilometer Reading & Time at the time of departure
    		7.  : {{doc.kilometer_reading}}, {{doc.time_of_departure}}
  7. Validity of Movement Order(No. of days & Hours)
    		8.  : {{doc.total_days_and_hours}} (from {{doc.from_date}} to {{doc.to_date}})
  8. Signature of the Officer utilising the pool vehicle
    		9.  : {{doc.employee_name}}
  9. Signature of the permitting Authority
    		10.  : {{frappe.get_fullname(doc.modified_by)}}
Note
  1. Pool vehicle are those vehicles which are not owned by individual officers but owned by government. They include vehicles received under various bilateral, multilateral and UN system assistance/loan programmes and projects, through their ownership vest with donor organisation.
  2. Specific purpose of moving a vehicle for each trip shall be recorded instead of Mentioning "Official".
  3. If a pool vehicle is released subject to payment of hire charges, if shall be Specific at column 5.

This print is system generated and should be considered VALID without appropriate seal and/or signature.

{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}
name: Vehicle Request
